alert.note: Alert for Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 10:52AM EST until February 24 at 10:30PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Conasauga River near Eton affecting Whitfield and Murray Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Conasauga River near Eton. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands, pasture and fields begins along the river, upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 286 or Dawnville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 13 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 7.8 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
